ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I am a faithful Messenger to you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I have been sent as a trusted messenger to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: I am a trustworthy Messenger to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I am a trustworthy Messengers sent to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “I am indeed a trustworthy Noble Messenger of Allah to you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: I am a trustworthy Messenger to you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely I am a faithful apostle to you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: I am for you a faithful Messenger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! I am a faithful messenger unto you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Truly, I am a trustworthy messenger for you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily I am unto you an apostle trusted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed I am a trusted apostle [sent] to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: I am to you a messenger worthy of all trust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: I am a trustworthy Messenger to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I am for you an honest Messenger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: I am to you a faithful messenger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:143] Truly I am a trusted messenger [sent] to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! lama faithful messenger unto you) I am a Messenger from Allah to you, and I am faithful as regards the message I bring,
